summary: An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal street railway system; providing for the construction of certain trackage and overhead on First Avenue South and on East Marginal Way; declaring the estimated cost thereof as near as may be; providing for the issuance of utility warrants in payment therefor; and creating and establishing a special fund to pay the principal and interest of said warrants.
